column4: Can anyone assist me in changing the icon of a program? (Ubuntu Software Center)
you're trying to change the icon in the Software Center itself?
I'm trying to change it because it is too small (and hence pixelated and bad-looking) with my Dock, Gnome-Do. So I need to change the icon to fix this.
drag the launcher to the desktop, you can change the icon from there, and drag it down to docky
